sections.title: Concept & Ambiance
sections.body: Hippie Fish is a sophisticated, contemporary Mediterranean coastal restaurant that brings the lifestyle of the Greek and Italian shores to Pererenan Beach. Its three-level architecture is a masterclass in design: a casual cocktail bar on the ground floor, a stylish air-conditioned restaurant on the second, and a Rooftop Bar with stunning sunset views.

sections.title: Menu & Signature Experience
sections.body: The restaurant offers soulful, scratch-made Mediterranean cuisine using local, organic ingredients. Must-try signatures include the refreshing Tuna Crudo, the classic Spaghetti Vongole, and the fresh Market Fish main course. The signature experience begins with sunset cocktails on the Rooftop, followed by an elegant seafood dinner downstairs.

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.body: With its multi-level venue offering unparalleled sunset ocean views, a refined Mediterranean menu, and a versatile ambiance catering to everything from casual drinks to elegant dining, Hippie Fish is a must-visit destination on the Pererenan coast.
